item.description:
Join us for a fun and engaging holiday networking event with nearly one hundred of Boston's business leaders and entrepreneurs at The Greatest Bar!! Meet new contacts and strengthen existing relationships over appetizers and drinks at the bar in an open environment reserved exclusively for Boston's largest group of Entrepreneurs: The Boston Entrepreneurs Group. There is no RSVP limit, so expect a good time and great conversation. There is no cahrge for this event thanks to our sponsor, Exemplar Law Partners.

Where: The Greatest Bar, 262 friend Street, Boston, O2114

TIME: 5:3Opm - 8pm

CASH BAR

Appetizers Served


* * * Bring your business cards * * *
item.name: Holiday Networking Party at The Greatest Bar! Eat, Drink, Network!!
